channel.title: [pi] change appearance [pi]
channel.description: hello, i currently have a pi base i recently made it so when you log in the make over mage change appearancee came up. i wish to make it so this only happens to new players, players which it is there first time login in on there account. this means that once an account has already been made and has been logged in once the char editor wont come up again. if anyone can help me do this it will make my day. thank you.

item.title: [pi] change appearance [pi]
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

i have already added that, this is a different question i only wont it for new accounts like it only happens to account which it is there first time loggin in. right now anyone logs in it comes up i only wont it to come up for accounts that its there first time logging in and only works the for the first time. do you get what i mean?

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] change appearance [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

You already posted this,

and someone already answered

stop spamming the forum with the same topic

Client.java

find

(addStarter)

Under that add

getPA().showInterface(3559); canChangeAppearance = true;

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] change appearance [pi]
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

hello, i currently have a pi base i recently made it so when you log in the make over mage change appearancee came up.
i wish to make it so this only happens to new players, players which it is there first time login in on there account.
this means that once an account has already been made and has been logged in once the char editor wont come up again. if anyone can help me do this it will make my day. thank you.
